Analyzing Clinical Trial Articles; Placebo and Sham Controls

Join the Webinar Classroom, Tuesday 9:00 am - 12:15 pm Pacific Time.

In this week's webinar, we will discuss how to analyze clinical trials for validity, bias, and relevance. In addition, we will discuss the problem of placebo controls in acupuncture trials. Our stats chat will introduce the concept and calculation of the risk ratio.

During the webinar, you will complete the In Class Exercise #5: "RCT checklist". Please download the worksheet before class.

Due this week:

  • MYMOP initial form
  • Respond to 2 posts in Discussion Forum #2 due July 11th before class

Preparation for next week:

  • Shen et al., Qu et al., Anderson & Rosenthal, Vickers et al.
  • McDonald & Janz 2017, Qaseem et al 2017
  • All responses due July 18th in Discussion Forum #2
